Chuck_will_Widow: medium-sized, slate-gray bird with a long, rounded tail
distinctive black and white striped crown and nape
black bill with a distinctive downcurved culmen
white wing patches visible in flight
Nighthawk: broad, rounded wings with long primary projection
dark grey-brown plumage with a distinctive white stripe running along the underside of the wing
dark brown eyes surrounded by a white eyering
legs and feet are short and stout
American_Three_toed_Woodpecker: black tail with white outer feathers
black bill with a distinctive red stripe
distinctive black stripes on the head and neck
Red_cockaded_Woodpecker: black tail with white outer feathers
black bill with a distinctive red stripe
distinctive red cockade on the head
